Text:
IMPORTANT:
Hell Yeah! Wrath of the Dead Rabbit requires Microsoft XNA Game Studio 4.0 to be installed.

If you haven’t installed already, install it from the “redist” subdir of where you installed the game.


Seed & Enjoy !

WARNING
I'M JUST TRYING TO HELP, MY ENGLISH IS TOO BAD

1- install the game and the features(XNA / NETframework/DirectX)

2- paste the crack content folder in the game folder

3- install "cracked steam" and logon with your account

4- open the game and play
